message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't have all the fun, I want a bit more!
I'll take the lead, but you'll still get a decent share!
You're getting greedy, but I'll give you a chance to reconsider!
I'll take the lion's share, but you'll still get a small consolation prize!
You're pushing your luck, but I'll give you a very small share!
I'll give you a token, but I'm taking the vast majority!
I'm not going down without a fight, take this!
I'll give up, you win this time, but I'll be back!
